title: Injective Targets $25 Amid Crucial Breakout Attempt ‚Äì New Highs In Sight?
body: Injective (INJ) has hit a five-month high after retesting a crucial resistance level on Monday and attempting to break out from a bullish pattern. Some analysts suggested that the cryptocurrency will have a massive run in the coming weeks. Related Reading: Bitcoin Demand Builds at $117K: Cost Basis Distribution Defines Key Support Level Injective Retests Crucial Levels Over the past month, Injective has recorded a substantial bullish performance, climbing 40% since late June, when the cryptocurrency traded below the $10 support. Since hitting its December high of $35.26, INJ has retraced around 60%, falling below this key support multiple times. During the April-May market recovery, the cryptocurrency broke out of its multi-month downtrend and climbed to its $10-$15 local price range, hitting a multi-month high of $15.48. However, the June pullback sent the token‚Äôs price to the $9 support zone before it bounced, tested the $10-$12 area, and broke out of its one-month downtrend in early July. At the time, analyst Crypto Rand suggested that a breakout above the $12 resistance level would ‚Äútrigger the bull reversal,‚Äù which would push the token‚Äôs price toward the local range high. Injective has been attempting to reclaim the crucial $15 range high since its early July breakout, hitting a five-month high of $16.35 on Monday and passing the $16 barrier for the first time since February. Amid the token‚Äôs momentum, Crypto Rand noted that ‚ÄúINJ following the path, we are going straight to $30‚Äù as the first stop.‚Äù He added that Injective has become the Layer-1 (L1) with the highest code commits over the past 365 days. A recent report showed that the network is leading with 36,500 commits, 3.2% ahead of other L1s. Is A Rally To New Highs Near? Analyst Ali Martinez highlighted that Injective could see a 66% rally if it breaks out of a triangle formation. According to the chart, the cryptocurrency has been forming an ascending triangle pattern since March, with the key resistance level sitting around the $15 area. Amid its start-of-week pump, the cryptocurrency briefly broke out of the pattern but ultimately failed to hold above the crucial resistance. Notably, INJ fell below the $15 mark after failing to reclaim this level, retracing 10% intraday. However, reclaiming the key resistance would propel Injective to $25, a level not seen since January. Meanwhile, market watcher Crypto Patel pointed out an inverse Head and Shoulders pattern forming on Injective‚Äôs chart over the past six months, which could propel the token to a new yearly high if it breaks out. He highlighted that the INJ‚Äôs rising trendline support remains intact, while the pattern‚Äôs neckline has been retested twice, with the price compressing between these two levels. To the analyst, Injective needs a daily close and hold above the $16.20 area to confirm the breakout. If it reclaims this level, the setup would target a 153% move toward $41 mark, with the post-breakout initial targets sitting around the $26.36 and $34.32 resistances. Related Reading: TRON Sees $1B USDT Mint: Liquidity Wave Incoming? On the contrary, he affirmed that falling below the $12 support zone would invalidate the setup, which could also send the token‚Äôs price to the next support level around the $10 mark. As of this writing, Injective trades at $14.70, a 4.6% decline in the daily timeframe. Featured Image from Unsplash.com, Chart from TradingView.com
tags: Cryptocurrency Market News|crypto analyst|Crypto Bull Run 2025|crypto market correction|Crypto Market Recovery|Crypto trader|INJ|INJ breakout|INJ Price|Injective|Injective blockchain|Injective Price Prediction|INJUSDT

title: Billions Flow Into Crypto‚ÄîBut 10x Research Warns Big Trouble Ahead
body: The post Billions Flow Into Crypto‚ÄîBut 10x Research Warns Big Trouble Ahead appeared first on Coinpedia Fintech News While billions are flowing into crypto as its market cap has jumped to $3.89 trillion and headlines highlight rising institutional interest. But according to a fresh report from 10x Research, things might not be as bullish as they look. Behind the scenes, small changes in the market suggest that today could quietly become an important moment that decides how the rest of the summer goes. Institutions Are Buying ETH, But the Market Is Getting Cautious While there‚Äôs growing crypto investment, especially from big institutions. But as per 10x Research , more and more public companies are adding Ethereum (ETH) to their holdings. They now hold over $5 billion worth of ETH. The biggest holder is Bitmine with $2.2 billion, followed by Sharplink, Bit Digital, and BTCS. Together, this makes up about 1.06% of ETH‚Äôs total supply. Adding to this trend, a new firm called Ether Machine is planning to enter the market with around $1.6 billion, which could push institutional ETH ownership even higher. But despite all this buying, 10x Research says warning signs are starting to show. However, trading volumes are shifting, NAV premiums are dropping, and funding rates are weakening. These small changes often appear before the market slows down, even when headlines are still full of optimism. MicroStrategy Isn‚Äôt Buying the Hype Another interesting sign comes from MicroStrategy, the company known for its huge Bitcoin holdings. In past bull runs, it often raised money by selling new shares to buy more Bitcoin. But this time, as 10x Research points out, the company hasn‚Äôt raised any capital in weeks. This unusual silence could mean they no longer see a strong upside‚Äîor maybe they sense risk. Either way, 10x Research sees it as a clear sign that momentum might be fading. What Retail Needs to Know However, 10x Research notes that despite these inflows, cracks are forming beneath the surface. Trading volumes are shifting, NAV premiums are fading, and funding rates are beginning to turn. These are usually early warning signs that market momentum could be slowing, even while the headlines still scream bullish.

body: The post Strong ETF Demand Drives $157 Million Bitcoin Purchases, $65 Million in Ethereum appeared first on Coinpedia Fintech News On July 28, U.S. spot Bitcoin ETFs saw net inflows of $157.1million, with Ethereum ETFs adding $65.2million, signalling strong ongoing demand for both assets .¬†Leading the purchases, BlackRock‚Äôs spot Bitcoin ETF acquired 1,230 BTC worth $147.4million, bringing its total holdings to over 739,000 BTC and reinforcing its place as the world‚Äôs largest Bitcoin ETF .¬†The new inflows come as institutional and retail investors continue allocating capital to crypto ETFs, despite recent market consolidation.

title: Asia stocks retreat amid tariff anxiety, eyes on BOJ & Fed meetings; US futures steady after mixed Wall Street session
body: Asian shares mostly fall on Tuesday, with Japan and Hong Kong leading the downturn. Investors adopted a cautious stance as a looming U.S. tariff deadline approaches, and major central bank decisions from both the Bank of Japan and the Federal Reserve are anticipated this week. Investor focus now turned to resumed trade talks between the US and China, following the recently announced US-EU trade agreement, that imposes a 15% tariff on most EU exports. The agreement follows a similar pact with Japan. US President Donald Trump also reiterated on Monday that countries unwilling to negotiate separate trade deals could soon face tariffs of 15% to 20%, significantly above the 10% headline rate imposed in April. Gold hovered around $3,310 per ounce on Tuesday, near a three-week low, as signs of easing trade tensions and a stronger US dollar. Japan ( NKY:IND ) fell 1.02% to below 40,700, while the broader Topix Index declined 0.8% to 2,908 on Tuesday, marking a third straight session of losses for Japanese equities. The Japanese yen hovered around 148.3 per dollar on Tuesday, holding near one-week lows after a sharp three-day decline, pressured by broad dollar strength. On the domestic front, the Bank of Japan is set to announce its latest policy decision this week. China ( SHCOMP ) fell 0.02% to around 3,595, while the Shenzhen Component dropped 0.5% to 11,160 on Tuesday, reversing the previous session‚Äôs gains as investors turned cautious ahead of developments in the US-China trade talks underway in Stockholm, and the offshore yuan stabilized to around 7.18 per dollar on Tuesday, following two consecutive sessions of losses. The negotiations entered their second day, with both sides aiming to extend a fragile trade truce by another 90 days ahead of the August 12 deadline. China has introduced a yearly childcare subsidy of CNY 3,600 for children under three to encourage childbirth and ease parenting costs amid a declining birth rate. Domestically, fiscal attention remains on the rollout of special bonds, with 231 billion yuan already allocated to support the consumer goods trade-in program and the remaining issuance expected in October, Hong Kong ( HSI ) fell 1.00% to 25,277 in early trade Tuesday, pulling back from Monday‚Äôs gains as all sectors were in the red. India¬†( SENSEX ) fell 0.22% to 80,802 in morning trade on Tuesday, hitting its lowest level since early June. The Nifty 50 also dropped below 24,700 amid sustained foreign outflows, disappointing Q1 earnings, and a lack of progress on a US-India interim trade deal ahead of a looming deadline. Australia ( AS51 ) rose 0.05% to 8,655 on Tuesday, reversing gains from the previous session as optimism surrounding trade deals began to fade. The Australian dollar In the U.S., on Monday, all three major indexes ended mixed as investors digested a new US-EU trade agreement and looked ahead to a busy week filled with earnings reports and key economic data. Sentiment was further weighed by caution ahead of key U.S. events this week, including the Fed‚Äôs rate decision and inflation readings. U.S. stock futures held steady on Tuesday following a mixed performance on Wall Street to start the week: Dow +0.15% ; S&P 500 +0.15% ; Nasdaq +0.23% . Investors also looked ahead to earnings from major tech names including Meta, Microsoft, Apple, and Amazon. Currencies: ( JPY:USD ), ( CNY:USD ), ( AUD:USD ), ( INR:USD ), ( HKD:USD ), ( NZD:USD ). More on Asia: Trump says U.S. strikes ‚Äòmassive‚Äô trade deal with Japan, imposes 15% tariffs Japan vows more rice imports from U.S. as part of trade deal Japanese PM Shigeru Ishiba to step down RBA holds rates steady, citing unclear inflation picture in July minutes Japan's core inflation eases to 3.3% in June, slowest pace since March

title: ETH Accumulation: SharpLink Gaming‚Äôs Astonishing Strategy to Dominate Ethereum Reserves
body: BitcoinWorld ETH Accumulation: SharpLink Gaming‚Äôs Astonishing Strategy to Dominate Ethereum Reserves In the dynamic world of cryptocurrency, where innovation constantly reshapes the landscape, a bold claim from a prominent figure often captures immediate attention. Consensys founder Joe Lubin, a titan in the Ethereum ecosystem, has made waves with his insights into SharpLink Gaming, an Ethereum (ETH) treasury firm he chairs. Lubin suggests that SharpLink is not just building its ETH reserves but is poised to outpace many other ETH-based projects in per-share ETH accumulation . This isn‚Äôt merely a boast; it points to a deliberate and aggressive strategy designed to solidify its position within the decentralized finance (DeFi) space. Let‚Äôs dive deeper into how SharpLink Gaming aims to achieve this remarkable feat and what it means for the broader Ethereum ecosystem. What is SharpLink Gaming and Why is its ETH Accumulation Strategy Unique? SharpLink Gaming, though its name might suggest a focus solely on gaming, operates as a sophisticated Ethereum treasury firm. Chaired by Joe Lubin, a co-founder of Ethereum and the mind behind Consensys, it leverages strategic financial mechanisms to bolster its holdings of the native cryptocurrency. The core of its unique approach to ETH accumulation lies in a two-pronged strategy: At-the-Market (ATM) Offerings: SharpLink is actively raising capital daily through ATM offerings. This method allows the company to sell newly issued shares directly into the open market at prevailing prices, providing a continuous stream of capital without the need for traditional, often cumbersome, fundraising rounds. This flexible approach enables them to react quickly to market conditions and optimize their capital-raising efforts. Staking Existing ETH for Yield: Beyond simply acquiring ETH, SharpLink is putting its existing reserves to work. By staking its Ethereum holdings, the firm generates additional yield, effectively compounding its growth. Staking involves locking up ETH to support the network‚Äôs operations, for which participants receive rewards. This passive income stream significantly enhances their ETH accumulation rate, creating a powerful flywheel effect. This combination of proactive capital raising and passive yield generation creates a potent engine for rapid asset growth, setting SharpLink apart in its pursuit of substantial Ethereum reserves. How Does SharpLink‚Äôs ETH Accumulation Compare to Other Giants? The scale of SharpLink‚Äôs ambition is evident when we look at its current holdings. According to a report from Cointelegraph, citing Lubin‚Äôs interview with Bloomberg Television, SharpLink currently holds a significant 360,800 ETH. This impressive figure places it as a major player in the realm of institutional Ethereum holders. To put this into perspective, let‚Äôs consider the landscape of large ETH treasury holders: Entity Current ETH Holdings Rank (by ETH holdings) BitMine Immersion Technologies 566,800 ETH 1st SharpLink Gaming 360,800 ETH 2nd While BitMine Immersion Technologies currently leads with 566,800 ETH, SharpLink‚Äôs rapid ascent to the second position underscores the effectiveness and aggressiveness of its ETH accumulation strategy. The continuous nature of its ATM offerings and the compounding power of staking suggest that its holdings could continue to grow at an accelerated pace, potentially challenging for the top spot in the future. What are the Broader Implications of Such Significant ETH Accumulation? The strategic maneuvers by firms like SharpLink Gaming carry significant implications for the broader Ethereum ecosystem and the cryptocurrency market as a whole. Large-scale ETH accumulation by institutional entities can influence several key aspects: Market Dynamics: Substantial holdings by a few entities could impact ETH‚Äôs liquidity and price stability. While it demonstrates strong institutional confidence in Ethereum, it also raises questions about centralization risks if too much ETH becomes concentrated. Network Security and Decentralization: As more ETH is staked, the security of the Ethereum network is enhanced. However, if a disproportionate amount of staked ETH is controlled by a handful of large players, it could potentially affect the network‚Äôs decentralization principles. Investor Confidence: The active involvement and public statements from figures like Joe Lubin, combined with tangible asset growth, can boost investor confidence in Ethereum‚Äôs long-term viability and potential for growth. It signals that established industry leaders are putting significant capital behind the network. Future of DeFi and Web3: Firms that hold substantial ETH reserves are well-positioned to become major players in the evolving DeFi and Web3 landscape. Their capital can be deployed into various decentralized applications, liquidity pools, or even new ventures, further fueling innovation within the ecosystem. Navigating the Path: Benefits and Potential Challenges of Rapid ETH Accumulation While SharpLink‚Äôs strategy for ETH accumulation appears robust, it‚Äôs essential to consider both the advantages and the potential hurdles that come with such an aggressive approach. Benefits: Enhanced Treasury Strength: A larger ETH treasury provides SharpLink with significant financial flexibility, enabling investments in new projects, acquisitions, or simply weathering market downturns. Compounding Returns: The combination of continuous capital inflow and yield generation through staking creates a powerful compounding effect, accelerating the growth of their ETH reserves exponentially. Long-Term Commitment: A substantial ETH holding signals a strong, long-term commitment to the Ethereum network and its future, which can attract further partnerships and investor interest. Potential Challenges: Market Volatility: The cryptocurrency market is notoriously volatile. While ETH accumulation during a bull run can be highly profitable, a significant market correction could impact the value of their holdings. Dilution Risk from ATM Offerings: Continuous ATM offerings, while effective for capital raising, can lead to dilution for existing shareholders if not managed carefully, potentially impacting per-share value in traditional financial terms. Regulatory Scrutiny: As crypto firms accumulate significant assets, they may attract increased attention from regulators, potentially leading to new compliance requirements or restrictions. Operational Complexity: Managing large, actively growing cryptocurrency treasuries requires sophisticated operational frameworks, robust security measures, and expert market analysis. Actionable Insights for the Savvy Crypto Enthusiast SharpLink Gaming‚Äôs aggressive ETH accumulation strategy offers valuable lessons for anyone interested in the crypto space, from individual investors to other institutional players: The Power of Staking: Understanding and utilizing staking mechanisms is crucial for long-term holders looking to generate passive income and compound their crypto assets. Strategic Capital Allocation: Observe how large entities manage their treasuries. Their methods for acquiring and deploying capital can provide insights into market trends and effective investment strategies. Long-Term Vision: The focus on building substantial reserves rather than short-term trading highlights a belief in Ethereum‚Äôs enduring value. This long-term perspective is often a hallmark of successful crypto investment. Risk Management: While the benefits of ETH accumulation are clear, always consider the associated risks, such as market volatility and potential concentration of assets. Diversification remains a key principle for individual investors. Joe Lubin‚Äôs vision for SharpLink Gaming paints a compelling picture of a firm strategically positioning itself at the forefront of the Ethereum economy. By leveraging continuous capital raising and intelligent yield generation through staking, SharpLink is not just accumulating ETH; it‚Äôs building a powerful financial engine designed to thrive in the evolving digital landscape. Their rapid rise in the ranks of major ETH treasury holders serves as a testament to the effectiveness of their approach and offers a glimpse into the future of institutional engagement with decentralized assets. As the crypto world watches, SharpLink Gaming‚Äôs journey could indeed redefine what it means to achieve significant ETH accumulation . Frequently Asked Questions (FAQs) What is SharpLink Gaming? SharpLink Gaming is an Ethereum (ETH) treasury firm chaired by Consensys founder Joe Lubin. It focuses on acquiring and managing significant reserves of ETH through strategic financial operations like at-the-market offerings and staking. Who is Joe Lubin and what is his connection to SharpLink Gaming? Joe Lubin is a co-founder of Ethereum and the founder of Consensys, a leading blockchain software company. He chairs SharpLink Gaming, lending his extensive expertise and vision to the firm‚Äôs strategic direction and its ambitious goals for ETH accumulation. How does SharpLink Gaming achieve rapid ETH accumulation? SharpLink employs a two-pronged strategy: daily at-the-market (ATM) offerings to raise capital by selling shares directly into the market, and staking its existing ETH reserves to generate yield and compound growth. This combination allows for continuous and accelerating accumulation. What are the benefits of staking ETH for a firm like SharpLink Gaming? Staking ETH allows SharpLink to earn passive income on its existing holdings, effectively increasing its ETH reserves without needing to purchase more. This yield generation compounds their growth, making their accumulation strategy more efficient and powerful over time. How does SharpLink‚Äôs large ETH accumulation impact the Ethereum ecosystem? SharpLink‚Äôs substantial ETH holdings can influence market liquidity, signal strong institutional confidence in Ethereum, and potentially contribute to network security through staking. However, large concentrations of assets also raise discussions about decentralization and market influence. Share Your Insights! What are your thoughts on SharpLink Gaming‚Äôs aggressive ETH accumulation strategy? Do you believe this approach will set a new standard for institutional crypto treasuries? Share this article on your social media channels and join the conversation! To learn more about the latest Ethereum market trends, explore our article on key developments shaping Ethereum‚Äôs institutional adoption. This post ETH Accumulation: SharpLink Gaming‚Äôs Astonishing Strategy to Dominate Ethereum Reserves first appeared on BitcoinWorld and is written by Editorial Team

title: XRP Price Projection Revisited: A Closer Look at Measured Moves
body: In a recent technical analysis shared on social media, prominent crypto analyst EGRAG Crypto has presented an updated outlook on XRP‚Äôs price trajectory, emphasizing the relevance of logarithmic measured moves over traditional linear projections. According to the analyst, this shift in methodology may offer a more accurate framework for predicting price targets across the cryptocurrency market. EGRAG Crypto noted that logarithmic measurements appear more reliable when applied to cryptocurrencies of all sizes‚Äîwhether high-cap, mid-cap, or low-cap assets. This conclusion stems from observing a trend in which price movements tend to overshoot traditional measured moves while aligning more closely with logarithmic targets. As a result, the analyst suggests that technical analysts may need to recalibrate their models to suit the exponential nature of crypto market growth. #XRP ‚Äì A Closer Look at Measured Moves: Lately, I've been observing a trend in the crypto-space: logarithmic measured moves seem to be more indicative than linear ones. This observation applies to a variety of crypto assets, whether they‚Äôre high-cap, mid-cap, or low-cap‚Ä¶ pic.twitter.com/TJDSwa75uC ‚Äî EGRAG CRYPTO (@egragcrypto) July 27, 2025 March 2023 Falling Wedge and Price Discrepancy A significant reference point in EGRAG Crypto‚Äôs chart is the falling wedge formation identified in March 2023. The measured move from that pattern fell short by 111%, as illustrated by the price failing to reach the expected target. This deviation is presented not as a retrospective critique, but rather as a demonstration of how relying on conventional tools may underestimate potential gains. The chart shows that while the projected target from that wedge pattern was approximately $1.78, XRP only managed to climb a fraction of that distance. The failure to fulfill the linear measured move underscores the importance of considering alternate methodologies, particularly logarithmic scaling, in dynamic market conditions. Current Formation and Forward Projections Building on this logic, EGRAG Crypto has identified a bullish pennant formation in the current price structure, which he uses to establish forward projections. Based on the measured move from this pattern, the analyst estimates a target around the $11 range for XRP . We are on X, follow us to connect with us :- @TimesTabloid1 ‚Äî TimesTabloid (@TimesTabloid1) June 15, 2025 However, he also raises a hypothetical yet significant scenario: if the current move were to fall short in a similar manner to the 2023 wedge, the resulting price could extend beyond the $11 mark and potentially approach $22. The chart includes marked Fibonacci extension levels, with key resistance levels at $4.13, $5.68, and $11.00, and an extended potential target at $22.13 corresponding to the 2.272 Fibonacci level. The path from the macro support zone, labelled ‚ÄúSuper Strong Support‚Äù near the $0.43 mark, towards these targets is depicted in phases. The ‚ÄúMacro GO-GO Level‚Äù around $1.96 acts as an inflection point, from which a sharp rally could be anticipated if the trend remains intact. Strategic Positioning and Market Sentiment The broader implication of this technical perspective is that XRP , like many other cryptocurrencies, may be entering a phase where traditional linear analysis tools are insufficient. The chart reflects consistent accumulation in the highlighted yellow zone, followed by a breakout and consolidation within a bullish pennant. This consolidation now appears to be resolving to the upside, according to the image attached in EGRAG Crypto‚Äôs post. EGRAG Crypto concludes by encouraging his followers to maintain a resilient approach as these patterns unfold. He acknowledges that some may disagree with the emphasis on logarithmic analysis but maintains that adapting to exponential market dynamics is essential. His assertion is clear: if the current measured move performs similarly to past underestimations, then XRP‚Äôs eventual peak in the ongoing cycle may be significantly higher than previously assumed. title: JD.com Stablecoin: Pioneering China‚Äôs Digital Finance Future
body: BitcoinWorld JD.com Stablecoin: Pioneering China‚Äôs Digital Finance Future The world of digital finance is constantly evolving, and a major player from China, JD.com ‚Äì often dubbed the ‚ÄúAmazon of China‚Äù ‚Äì is making significant waves. Recent reports indicate that this e-commerce giant is venturing deeper into the blockchain realm, specifically with a keen interest in stablecoins. This move, centered around a new trademark application, could redefine the landscape for JD.com stablecoin development and digital currency in one of the world‚Äôs largest economies. Are we on the cusp of seeing a major e-commerce platform issue its own digital currency? What‚Äôs Behind JD.com‚Äôs Stablecoin Ambitions? The buzz began with a report from local news outlet Ming Pao, revealing that JD.com, through its blockchain subsidiary JD Coinlink, has filed a trademark application. This isn‚Äôt just any application; it‚Äôs directly linked to stablecoins, a class of cryptocurrencies designed to minimize price volatility, usually by pegging their value to a stable asset like the US dollar or a fiat currency. The names registered, ‚ÄúJCOIN‚Äù and ‚ÄúJOYCOIN,‚Äù are widely speculated to be the firm‚Äôs proposed stablecoin names. This strategic maneuver by JD Coinlink signals a clear intent to play a pivotal role in the future of digital transactions. But what exactly does this trademark application entail? The services listed are particularly insightful, pointing towards a comprehensive suite of digital financial offerings. These include: Blockchain-based electronic fund transfers: This suggests a direct application for seamless and efficient digital payments within and potentially beyond JD.com‚Äôs vast e-commerce ecosystem. Imagine quicker settlements for online purchases or supply chain transactions. Crypto financial transactions: This broad category could encompass a range of services, from facilitating cryptocurrency exchanges to offering crypto-backed lending or other innovative financial products. It positions JD.com as a potential hub for various digital asset activities. This isn‚Äôt JD.com‚Äôs first foray into advocating for digital currencies. Historically, the company has been vocal, even urging China‚Äôs central bank, the People‚Äôs Bank of China (PBOC), to give the green light for the issuance of a yuan-backed stablecoin. This consistent interest underscores their long-term vision for integrating digital currencies into their business model and the broader Chinese economy. The potential for a JD.com stablecoin to streamline operations and enhance user experience is immense. Unpacking the ‚ÄòJCOIN‚Äô and ‚ÄòJOYCOIN‚Äô Trademarks: JD.com Stablecoin Unveiled? The registration of ‚ÄúJCOIN‚Äù and ‚ÄúJOYCOIN‚Äù as potential stablecoin names is a fascinating development. While details remain scarce, market observers are already speculating on their potential functions and target audiences. Could ‚ÄúJCOIN‚Äù be a general-purpose stablecoin for broader use, perhaps pegged to the Chinese Yuan, mirroring the company‚Äôs past advocacy? And what about ‚ÄúJOYCOIN‚Äù? The name evokes a sense of user-friendliness and might suggest a consumer-facing application, possibly for loyalty programs, gaming, or specific digital content purchases within JD.com‚Äôs extensive digital ecosystem. The strategic naming indicates a thoughtful approach to market positioning. A JD.com stablecoin , if realized, could serve multiple purposes: Enhancing E-commerce Payments: Imagine instant, low-cost payments for millions of daily transactions on JD.com‚Äôs platform, bypassing traditional banking rails. This could reduce fees for merchants and offer faster settlement times. Facilitating Supply Chain Finance: JD.com has a massive logistics and supply chain network. A stablecoin could revolutionize how suppliers are paid, how inventory is tracked, and how financing flows through the supply chain, increasing transparency and efficiency. Cross-Border Transactions: While China maintains strict capital controls, a stablecoin could potentially simplify cross-border payments for businesses operating within specific regulatory frameworks or pilot zones, offering a more efficient alternative to traditional remittance services. Loyalty Programs and Rewards: ‚ÄúJOYCOIN‚Äù specifically could be integrated into JD.com‚Äôs loyalty programs, offering customers digital rewards that are stable in value and easily redeemable, enhancing customer retention and engagement. The ambition here is clear: to leverage blockchain technology to create a more efficient, transparent, and user-friendly financial infrastructure that deeply integrates with JD.com‚Äôs core business. This isn‚Äôt just about a new digital currency; it‚Äôs about building an entire ecosystem around a JD.com stablecoin that can serve both consumers and businesses. The Broader Implications: JD.com Stablecoin and China‚Äôs Digital Yuan Landscape JD.com‚Äôs stablecoin aspirations don‚Äôt exist in a vacuum. They are set against the backdrop of China‚Äôs aggressive push for its own central bank digital currency (CBDC), the digital yuan (e-CNY). The PBOC has been a pioneer in CBDC development, with extensive trials across major cities and various use cases. This raises a crucial question: how would a private JD.com stablecoin coexist with, or even compete against, the state-backed digital yuan? There are several possibilities: Complementary Role: It‚Äôs plausible that a JD.com stablecoin could serve as a complementary asset to the e-CNY. For instance, the e-CNY might be the primary medium for retail payments, while JD.com‚Äôs stablecoin could specialize in specific enterprise applications, such as supply chain finance, inter-company settlements, or even as a loyalty token. This would allow the PBOC to maintain control over monetary policy while private entities innovate on specific use cases. Innovation Sandbox: The PBOC might allow private stablecoins like the proposed JD.com stablecoin to operate within a regulated ‚Äúsandbox‚Äù environment, enabling innovation and testing new blockchain applications without posing systemic risks. This approach could provide valuable insights for future digital currency policies. Regulatory Challenges: China has historically taken a cautious, often restrictive, stance on private cryptocurrencies. The government‚Äôs focus has been on maintaining financial stability and control. For a private stablecoin to thrive, it would require explicit regulatory approval and likely operate under strict supervision, adhering to anti-money laundering (AML) and know-your-customer (KYC) regulations. The prior call for a yuan-backed stablecoin suggests JD.com is aiming for alignment with national policy. The interplay between private sector innovation and state-led digital currency initiatives is a defining feature of China‚Äôs digital economy. The success of a JD.com stablecoin will largely depend on its ability to navigate this complex regulatory environment and demonstrate clear benefits that align with national economic goals. Challenges and Opportunities for JD.com Stablecoin Launching a stablecoin, especially in a tightly regulated market like China, comes with its own set of hurdles and immense potential. Understanding these aspects is key to appreciating the significance of JD.com‚Äôs latest move. Key Challenges: Regulatory Approval: This is arguably the biggest hurdle. China‚Äôs stance on private cryptocurrencies has been largely prohibitive. Gaining official approval from the PBOC and other financial regulators for a privately issued JD.com stablecoin , even if yuan-backed, will be a monumental task requiring clear alignment with national financial policy and control. Competition with e-CNY: The digital yuan is already in advanced stages of deployment. JD.com is itself a participant in e-CNY trials. A private stablecoin would need to offer distinct advantages or cater to specific niches that the e-CNY does not fully address to justify its existence. Technological Integration and Scalability: Building a robust, secure, and scalable blockchain infrastructure capable of handling JD.com‚Äôs massive transaction volume is a significant engineering challenge. Ensuring interoperability with existing financial systems and consumer interfaces will be crucial. Market Adoption: While JD.com has a vast user base, convincing both consumers and businesses to adopt a new digital currency requires extensive education, trust-building, and seamless user experience. Data Privacy and Security: Operating a digital currency involves handling sensitive financial data. Ensuring top-tier security against cyber threats and maintaining user privacy in compliance with stringent Chinese data laws will be paramount. Immense Opportunities: Enhanced Efficiency and Cost Reduction: A stablecoin could drastically reduce transaction fees and settlement times for JD.com‚Äôs e-commerce and logistics operations, leading to significant cost savings and improved cash flow for businesses. Innovation in Financial Services: Beyond payments, a JD.com stablecoin could unlock new financial products, such as micro-lending for small merchants, supply chain financing solutions, or even tokenized assets, leveraging the company‚Äôs extensive data and network. Global Reach (Potential Future): While initially focused on the domestic market, a successful and compliant stablecoin could, in the long term, potentially facilitate cross-border e-commerce and payments for JD.com, expanding its international footprint. Competitive Advantage: Being an early mover (if approved) in the private stablecoin space could give JD.com a significant competitive edge over other e-commerce platforms, attracting more merchants and consumers through innovative payment and financial solutions. Data-Driven Insights: A blockchain-based payment system could provide JD.com with invaluable, real-time data on consumer spending habits and supply chain dynamics, enabling more informed business decisions and personalized services. The path forward for a JD.com stablecoin is undoubtedly challenging, but the potential rewards in terms of efficiency, innovation, and market leadership are substantial. What‚Äôs Next for JD.com Stablecoin and Digital Finance? The filing of the ‚ÄúJCOIN‚Äù and ‚ÄúJOYCOIN‚Äù trademarks by JD.com‚Äôs blockchain subsidiary, JD Coinlink, marks a significant milestone in the company‚Äôs digital currency journey. This isn‚Äôt just a speculative move; it‚Äôs a concrete step towards potentially launching a proprietary stablecoin. The immediate next steps will likely involve intensive engagement with Chinese regulators, particularly the People‚Äôs Bank of China, to navigate the complex legal and policy landscape surrounding private digital currencies. Should JD.com receive the necessary approvals, the development and deployment of a JD.com stablecoin would likely unfold in phases. This could begin with internal trials within JD.com‚Äôs vast ecosystem, followed by limited public pilots, similar to the rollout of the e-CNY. The focus would be on demonstrating stability, security, and utility, particularly in areas like e-commerce payments and supply chain finance where JD.com has a dominant presence. This development also has broader implications for the global digital finance landscape. As major economies explore CBDCs and private stablecoins gain traction, JD.com‚Äôs initiative could serve as a case study for how large corporations can integrate blockchain technology into their core operations. It highlights the growing convergence of traditional commerce and decentralized finance, pushing the boundaries of what‚Äôs possible in digital transactions. The journey of JD.com stablecoin will be closely watched by investors, competitors, and regulators worldwide, offering valuable insights into the future of money and commerce in the digital age. Conclusion: JD.com‚Äôs trademark application for ‚ÄúJCOIN‚Äù and ‚ÄúJOYCOIN‚Äù is a bold declaration of its intent to deepen its involvement in the stablecoin arena. This strategic move, spearheaded by JD Coinlink, underscores the e-commerce giant‚Äôs ambition to leverage blockchain technology for enhanced efficiency in payments, supply chain management, and potentially new financial services. While navigating China‚Äôs stringent regulatory environment and the omnipresence of the digital yuan presents significant challenges, the opportunities for innovation and market leadership are immense. The potential emergence of a JD.com stablecoin could redefine digital commerce in China and set a precedent for corporate stablecoin initiatives globally, making it a development worth watching closely as the digital finance revolution continues to unfold. Frequently Asked Questions (FAQs) Q1: What is a stablecoin? A stablecoin is a type of cryptocurrency designed to maintain a stable value, usually pegged to a fiat currency like the US dollar or the Chinese Yuan, or to a commodity like gold. This stability makes them suitable for transactions, savings, and other financial activities where price volatility is a concern, unlike traditional cryptocurrencies like Bitcoin or Ethereum. Q2: Why is JD.com interested in stablecoins? JD.com‚Äôs interest in stablecoins stems from its desire to enhance the efficiency of its vast e-commerce and logistics operations. A JD.com stablecoin could enable faster, cheaper, and more transparent payments for consumers and merchants, streamline supply chain finance, and potentially open doors to new blockchain-based financial services. Q3: How does JD.com‚Äôs stablecoin initiative relate to China‚Äôs digital yuan (e-CNY)? JD.com‚Äôs stablecoin ambitions exist alongside China‚Äôs state-backed digital yuan (e-CNY). While the e-CNY is a central bank digital currency (CBDC) primarily for retail payments, a private JD.com stablecoin could potentially serve as a complementary asset for specific enterprise applications like supply chain finance or loyalty programs, provided it receives regulatory approval and aligns with national financial policy. Q4: What are the potential benefits of JD.com launching a stablecoin? If successful, a JD.com stablecoin could offer numerous benefits, including reduced transaction costs and faster settlements for e-commerce, improved transparency and efficiency in supply chain finance, new avenues for loyalty programs, and a potential competitive advantage in the digital finance space by offering innovative payment and financial solutions. Q5: What challenges might JD.com face in launching a stablecoin? The primary challenges include securing regulatory approval from Chinese authorities, navigating potential competition with the e-CNY, ensuring robust technological integration and scalability for its massive user base, achieving widespread market adoption, and maintaining stringent data privacy and security standards in a highly regulated environment. Q6: Will JD.com‚Äôs stablecoin be available outside China? Initially, any JD.com stablecoin would likely focus on the domestic Chinese market, given the regulatory complexities and China‚Äôs capital controls. However, if successful and compliant, there could be long-term potential for it to facilitate cross-border e-commerce and payments in specific, regulated international contexts, expanding JD.com‚Äôs global reach. Did you find this article insightful? Share it with your friends and colleagues on social media to spread the word about JD.com‚Äôs groundbreaking steps into the world of stablecoins and digital finance! title: KuCoin Expands Trust Framework with BitGo Integration and Asset Segregation Capabilities
body: The post KuCoin Expands Trust Framework with BitGo Integration and Asset Segregation Capabilities appeared first on Coinpedia Fintech News Dual-layered trust model aims to meet rising institutional standards in a regulated crypto era In response to evolving regulatory expectations and increasing institutional participation in the cryptocurrency market, KuCoin has introduced a major advancement in its trust and security infrastructure. The global exchange has partnered with BitGo Singapore to implement off-exchange settlement (OES) for institutional clients, extending its ongoing proof-of-reserves program into a comprehensive, dual-layered trust system. This move builds on KuCoin‚Äôs ‚ÄúTrust Project,‚Äù a $2 billion initiative launched in 2024 to address the industry‚Äôs growing need for systemic transparency, custody separation, and regulatory alignment. In this next phase, the exchange is offering asset segregation through BitGo‚Äôs Go Network, an MAS-regulated custody solution allowing institutions to execute trades on KuCoin without transferring asset custody to the exchange. The new model provides institutional users with direct control over their assets, insurance coverage up to $250 million, and post-trade settlement, ensuring that funds remain under third-party custody until execution is finalized. This model is designed to mitigate counterparty risk while maintaining access to KuCoin‚Äôs trading products and liquidity. ‚ÄúNot your keys, not your coins‚Äù has become a guiding principle in the post-FTX crypto landscape. KuCoin‚Äôs dual-layer approach, proof-of-reserves for transparency and OES for operational segregation, responds directly to this shift in user expectations, particularly among institutions and advanced retail users. The first layer of this framework involves monthly proof-of-reserves disclosures, verified through Merkle Tree mechanisms, enabling users to audit their asset holdings on-chain. The second layer, introduced with the BitGo integration, establishes physical separation of funds, providing a new level of custodial assurance. KuCoin is also undergoing SOC 2 Type II audits and pursuing regulatory licensing under Europe‚Äôs MiCA framework, further strengthening its compliance credentials. These efforts position the exchange among the few global platforms offering a combined strategy of transparency, segregated custody, and regulatory alignment. While the BitGo solution is tailored for institutions, the broader initiative underscores KuCoin‚Äôs long-term approach: ensuring that all users, retail and institutional alike, have the ability to verify, control, and securely exit the platform if needed. KuCoin currently serves over 41 million users across 200+ countries and regions. As the industry shifts from growth-driven competition to trust-centric infrastructure building, KuCoin is positioning itself as a stable and compliant partner in the maturing digital asset economy.

title: Ex-Ripple Executive Explains Why XRP Is ‚ÄúIntrinsically Important‚Äù to Ripple
body: The current market value of XRP continues to raise questions among observers who expect higher prices from a digital asset tied to real-world utility. Despite its established role in cross-border payment systems, XRP has only recently surpassed its 2018 peak . The years it spent below this level raised questions among many market participants. SMQKE (@SMQKEDQG), a prominent crypto researcher, shared a video on X where Marcus Treacher, former Senior Vice President of Customer Success at Ripple, addressed this issue, offering a detailed view of why Ripple sees XRP‚Äôs value differently. Rather than focusing on short-term fluctuations, Treacher emphasized that XRP holds strategic importance within Ripple‚Äôs business model. He noted that Ripple views XRP not as a speculative asset but as an ‚Äúintrinsic component‚Äù of a future global payment infrastructure. ‚ÄúWe‚Äôre here for the long game,‚Äù he said, expressing confidence in XRP‚Äôs long-term value and role in transforming how financial transactions are processed globally. Marcus Treacher explains why XRP is ‚Äúintrinsically important‚Äù to Ripple‚Äôs business operations. Listen closely. pic.twitter.com/q6cW2IgRrO ‚Äî SMQKE (@SMQKEDQG) July 28, 2025 XRP‚Äôs Value Proposition Beyond Price Treacher pointed out that XRP had already experienced significant growth in 2017, which remains a reference point for its potential. More importantly, he highlighted that Ripple‚Äôs commitment to XRP is rooted in its utility and its role within the broader financial ecosystem . ‚ÄúThis isn‚Äôt a speculated currency,‚Äù he stated. Instead, Ripple sees XRP as ‚Äúan intrinsic component of the future model‚Äù for cross-border payments. According to Treacher, Ripple is actively working to create what he described as ‚Äúincentive value‚Äù for XRP by integrating it into systems that improve the speed and efficiency of global money transfers . In doing so, Ripple aims to address longstanding inefficiencies in international payments, an area often plagued by delays, high costs, and a lack of transparency. We are on X, follow us to connect with us :- @TimesTabloid1 ‚Äî TimesTabloid (@TimesTabloid1) June 15, 2025 The Broader Impact of Payment Innovation By positioning XRP at the center of this new framework, Ripple believes that demand for the asset will naturally increase over time. Ripple‚Äôs executives have previously revealed that the company prioritizes long-term adoption and utility over short-term price movements , and Treacher linked Ripple‚Äôs mission with the broader development of blockchain-based financial systems. He described payments as ‚Äúthe bedrock of everything else that happens on blockchain,‚Äù arguing that improvements in this area could catalyze broader adoption of decentralized technologies. The focus, according to Treacher, is on enabling a more efficient and resilient global transaction network. He expressed satisfaction with XRP‚Äôs resilience , suggesting that its ability to maintain a steady presence in the market reflects the strength of Ripple‚Äôs strategy. ‚ÄúWe‚Äôre delighted at the rise of XRP and its resilience,‚Äù he remarked, adding that Ripple expects the asset to ‚Äúgrow quite healthily‚Äù in the years ahead. Disclaimer : This content is meant to inform and should not be considered financial advice. The views expressed in this article may include the author‚Äôs personal opinions and do not represent Times Tabloid‚Äôs opinion. Readers are advised to conduct thorough research before making any investment decisions. Any action taken by the reader is strictly at their own risk. Times Tabloid is not responsible for any financial losses. title: Bitcoin Correction: Unpacking the Alarming Dip as U.S. Demand Wanes
body: BitcoinWorld Bitcoin Correction: Unpacking the Alarming Dip as U.S. Demand Wanes The cryptocurrency market is an ever-evolving landscape, often characterized by rapid shifts and unexpected turns. Currently, the buzz among traders and analysts revolves around a potential extended Bitcoin correction . What exactly is fueling this growing concern, and how might it impact your crypto portfolio? Recent data points to a significant shift in U.S. investor behavior, suggesting that the current market downturn might persist longer than some anticipate. What‚Äôs Driving the Current Bitcoin Correction? At the heart of the recent market unease is a key metric known as the 60-day BTC premium. This indicator, as reported by CoinDesk, measures the price difference between Bitcoin (BTC) traded on Coinbase, a popular U.S.-based exchange, and Binance, a global exchange. Historically, a positive premium on Coinbase has indicated strong buying pressure from U.S. investors, often signaling bullish sentiment. However, for the first time since late May, this 60-day BTC premium has turned negative. What does a negative premium signify? It suggests that U.S. investors are either selling more Bitcoin than they are buying, or their buying interest has significantly diminished compared to global markets. This reduced buying pressure from a traditionally dominant market participant like the U.S. can have profound implications for Bitcoin‚Äôs price trajectory. To better understand the implications, consider the following: Positive Premium: Coinbase price is higher than Binance. Indicates strong U.S. demand, often leading to price rallies. Negative Premium: Coinbase price is lower than Binance. Suggests weaker U.S. demand, potentially signaling further price declines or a prolonged Bitcoin correction . Zero Premium: Prices are roughly equal. Indicates balanced demand between the U.S. and global markets. The shift to a negative premium is a clear signal that a significant source of demand is currently on the sidelines or actively taking profits, contributing directly to the ongoing Bitcoin correction . Why is U.S. Investor Demand Crucial for Bitcoin‚Äôs Health? The United States plays an undeniable role in the global cryptocurrency market. Its influence stems from several factors, including a large and sophisticated investor base, significant institutional adoption, and the presence of major crypto companies and regulatory frameworks. Here‚Äôs why U.S. investor sentiment is so pivotal: Institutional Clout: The U.S. is home to numerous institutional investors, hedge funds, and publicly traded companies that have embraced Bitcoin. Their large-scale buying or selling can move markets dramatically. When these big players reduce their exposure or halt new investments, it creates a substantial vacuum in demand. Retail Participation: Millions of individual U.S. investors actively participate in the crypto market. While individual trades might be small, their collective action can significantly impact market dynamics. A decline in retail interest or an increase in profit-taking can amplify downward trends. Regulatory Influence: U.S. regulatory developments often set precedents for other nations. Uncertainty or stricter stances from U.S. regulators can deter investment, not just domestically but globally, affecting overall market sentiment and contributing to a Bitcoin correction . Access to Capital: U.S. markets provide deep liquidity and access to capital, making them attractive for large-volume trades. A slowdown in this liquidity can lead to less efficient price discovery and increased volatility. Therefore, when U.S. investor demand weakens, it‚Äôs not just a domestic issue; it sends ripples across the entire global crypto ecosystem, making a sustained Bitcoin correction a more likely scenario. Has This Bitcoin Correction Happened Before? Lessons from History For seasoned crypto enthusiasts, market corrections are a familiar, albeit often painful, part of the journey. Bitcoin has a history of dramatic price swings, including significant pullbacks that have tested investor resolve. Understanding these past cycles can provide valuable perspective on the current Bitcoin correction . Consider these historical patterns: 2017-2018 Bear Market: Following its parabolic rise to nearly $20,000, Bitcoin entered a prolonged bear market, shedding over 80% of its value. This period saw a significant drop in retail enthusiasm and a re-evaluation of the market. 2021-2022 Correction: After hitting all-time highs above $69,000, Bitcoin experienced another substantial downturn, driven by macroeconomic concerns, regulatory crackdowns, and a general deleveraging in the crypto space. Shifts in Dominant Demand: Historically, periods of strong Asian market demand have sometimes counterbalanced Western market weakness, and vice-versa. The current situation, where U.S. demand is specifically highlighted as weakening, suggests a significant shift in a primary demand driver. These past events teach us that corrections are a normal, albeit sometimes lengthy, phase in Bitcoin‚Äôs market cycles. They often precede periods of consolidation and eventual recovery, but the duration and depth can vary significantly based on underlying factors like investor demand and broader economic conditions. The current Bitcoin correction , influenced by U.S. demand, aligns with historical patterns of market rebalancing. What Are the Challenges of a Persistent Bitcoin Correction? While corrections are natural, a prolonged or deepening Bitcoin correction presents several challenges for investors and the broader crypto market: Further Price Depreciation: The most immediate challenge is the potential for Bitcoin‚Äôs price to fall further. This can lead to increased losses for those who bought at higher prices. Investor FUD (Fear, Uncertainty, Doubt): A persistent downturn can erode investor confidence, leading to panic selling and a general atmosphere of fear that makes rational decision-making difficult. Liquidation Risks: For traders using leverage, a continued price decline increases the risk of liquidations, where their positions are automatically closed, often at a loss, to cover margin calls. This can create cascading sell-offs. Impact on Altcoins: The vast majority of altcoins are highly correlated with Bitcoin. A significant Bitcoin correction almost invariably drags down the entire altcoin market, sometimes with even greater percentage losses. Reduced Innovation and Development: In prolonged bear markets, funding for new projects can dry up, and developer activity might slow down, potentially impacting the pace of innovation within the ecosystem. Navigating these challenges requires a robust strategy and a clear understanding of market dynamics, especially during a period of a pronounced Bitcoin correction . How Can Investors Navigate This Bitcoin Correction? While the current market sentiment might feel daunting, a Bitcoin correction also presents opportunities for strategic investors. Here are some actionable insights: Dollar-Cost Averaging (DCA): Instead of trying to time the market, consider investing a fixed amount regularly, regardless of price. This strategy helps average out your purchase price over time and can be particularly effective during downtrends. Risk Management: Never invest more than you can afford to lose. Diversify your portfolio beyond just Bitcoin. For traders, utilizing stop-loss orders can help limit potential losses. Long-Term Perspective: For many, Bitcoin is a long-term investment. Short-term price fluctuations, while impactful, may be less significant over a multi-year horizon. Focus on Bitcoin‚Äôs fundamental value proposition and its potential as a store of value or digital gold. Research and Education: Use this period to deepen your understanding of Bitcoin and the broader crypto market. Knowledge is power, especially when volatility is high. Avoid Emotional Decisions: Market corrections can trigger strong emotional responses. Resist the urge to panic sell or make impulsive decisions based on fear or FOMO (Fear of Missing Out) if prices briefly recover. Stick to your pre-defined investment plan. By adopting a disciplined approach, investors can better position themselves to weather the storm of a Bitcoin correction and potentially capitalize on future recoveries. Beyond Bitcoin: What‚Äôs the Broader Market Impact of This Correction? A significant Bitcoin correction rarely occurs in isolation; its ripple effects are typically felt across the entire cryptocurrency ecosystem. Bitcoin often acts as the market‚Äôs bellwether, meaning its price movements influence the direction of most other digital assets. Here‚Äôs how a persistent Bitcoin correction can impact the broader market: Altcoin Performance: Most altcoins tend to follow Bitcoin‚Äôs lead. When Bitcoin corrects, altcoins often experience even sharper declines, as investors de-risk and move capital out of more speculative assets. Stablecoin Usage: During periods of high volatility and price uncertainty, investors often move their funds into stablecoins (cryptocurrencies pegged to fiat currencies like the USD) as a safe haven. This can lead to increased stablecoin trading volumes. Capital Rotation: While many assets may decline, a correction can also lead to capital rotation. Some investors might move funds from declining assets into projects they believe are undervalued or have stronger long-term potential, creating isolated rallies. Market Sentiment and Innovation: A prolonged bear market can dampen overall market sentiment, potentially slowing down the pace of new project launches and innovation as funding becomes scarcer. However, it can also be a period for builders to focus on core development without the distraction of speculative frenzy. Understanding these interconnected dynamics is crucial for anyone navigating the current market environment. The weakening U.S. investor demand for Bitcoin serves as a significant signal for the entire crypto landscape. Conclusion The recent shift in the 60-day BTC premium, indicating weakening U.S. investor demand, is a critical signal that the current Bitcoin correction may indeed persist. This metric, which highlights reduced buying pressure from a key market participant, underscores the importance of monitoring regional market dynamics. While market corrections are a natural part of the cryptocurrency cycle, the specific drivers, such as a decline in U.S. investor interest, provide valuable insights into potential future price action. Investors are encouraged to remain informed, practice sound risk management, and consider long-term strategies like dollar-cost averaging to navigate these turbulent times. The crypto market‚Äôs resilience has been proven time and again, but understanding the underlying forces at play, like the crucial role of U.S. demand, is paramount for making informed decisions. Frequently Asked Questions (FAQs) 1. What is the 60-day BTC premium, and why is it important? The 60-day BTC premium measures the price difference between Bitcoin on Coinbase (U.S. exchange) and Binance (global exchange) over a 60-day period. It‚Äôs important because it indicates the buying or selling pressure from U.S. investors. A negative premium, as seen recently, suggests weakening U.S. demand, which can contribute to a Bitcoin correction . 2. Why is U.S. investor demand so crucial for Bitcoin‚Äôs price? The U.S. market has significant influence due to its large base of institutional and retail investors, substantial capital, and impact on global regulatory trends. Strong U.S. demand often fuels price rallies, while weakening demand can lead to or prolong a Bitcoin correction . 3. How long could this current Bitcoin correction last? The duration of a Bitcoin correction is difficult to predict precisely, as it depends on various factors including macroeconomic conditions, regulatory developments, and a return of strong buying pressure. Historical corrections have lasted anywhere from a few months to over a year. Monitoring key indicators like the BTC premium can offer clues. 4. What should investors do during a market correction like this? During a Bitcoin correction , investors should focus on risk management, consider strategies like dollar-cost averaging, maintain a long-term perspective, and avoid making emotional decisions. Diversifying portfolios and staying informed about market fundamentals are also crucial. 5. Does a Bitcoin correction affect other cryptocurrencies? Yes, a Bitcoin correction typically has a significant impact on the broader cryptocurrency market. Most altcoins are highly correlated with Bitcoin and tend to follow its price movements, often experiencing even larger percentage drops during a downturn. Investors may also move funds into stablecoins as a safe haven. Did you find this article insightful? Share it with your friends and fellow crypto enthusiasts on social media to help them understand the current market dynamics and the potential for a persistent Bitcoin correction ! To learn more about the latest explore our article on key developments shaping Bitcoin price action. This post Bitcoin Correction: Unpacking the Alarming Dip as U.S. Demand Wanes first appeared on BitcoinWorld and is written by Editorial Team

title: Tron Inc. Registers $1B in Securities to Pivot Into TRX-Focused Crypto Treasury
body: Tron, Nasdaq-listed company formerly known for selling theme park souvenirs, has filed to register up to $1 billion in securities as it shifts its core strategy toward building a crypto treasury centered on TRX, the native token of the Tron blockchain. Key Takeaways: Tron Inc. plans to raise up to $1B to build a TRX-based crypto treasury. The strategy follows Strategy‚Äôs model but involves a less liquid token with higher risk. Governance concerns arise due to close ties between the company and Tron ecosystem insiders. According to a regulatory filing submitted Monday , the company intends to issue stock, debt, and other financial instruments ‚Äúfrom time to time.‚Äù The proceeds are slated for the purchase of TRX tokens and additional strategies designed to ‚Äúestablish income streams or otherwise generate funds‚Äù from its holdings. Tron Inc. Adopts Strategy-Style Treasury Model, But with TRX The approach mirrors the high-profile crypto treasury model popularized by Michael Saylor‚Äôs Strategy. However, unlike Saylor‚Äôs bet on Bitcoin, Tron is committing to a token with lower liquidity and a narrower investor base. The company warned that ‚Äúa decline in TRX prices or waning investor interest‚Äù could impact its ability to raise future capital. In its filing, Tron disclosed that its traditional toy and souvenir business ‚Äúdid not generate positive cash flow from operations‚Äù in 2024. Without a turnaround in that division, the firm said it plans to rely on proceeds from equity or debt offerings to meet obligations. Governance concerns loom over the pivot. While the company notes no formal role for Tron founder Justin Sun, its board is chaired by Sun‚Äôs father, Weike Sun. From entertainment to blockchain innovation. Tron Inc. (formerly SRM Entertainment) is now officially #NasdaqListed under its new name, pioneering blockchain-integrated treasury strategies. Congrats on this milestone, $TRON ! pic.twitter.com/OAn8Lp3pW0 ‚Äî Nasdaq Exchange (@NasdaqExchange) July 24, 2025 Additionally, it includes a Tron DAO advisor and Tronscan‚Äôs lead developer. The $100 million in Tron used to fund a reverse merger in June was held by a Hong Kong trust where one of Tron Inc.‚Äôs directors also serves, raising concerns of entanglement between the firm and the broader Tron ecosystem. TRON Blockchain Surpasses Ethereum in USDT Supply As reported, the TRON blockchain has surpassed Ethereum as the leading blockchain for USDT , now hosting $80.8 billion in supply versus Ethereum‚Äôs $73.8 billion. Daily transaction counts for USDT on TRON are nearly seven times higher than Ethereum‚Äôs, and the network processes over $24.6 billion in USDT transfers each day, reinforcing its dominance in stablecoin liquidity and usage. The network‚Äôs growth is being fueled by its gasless transaction model, which now accounts for 75% of all activity. TRON recorded 273 million transactions in May and 28.7 million active addresses in June‚Äîits highest since mid-2023. The ease of access has made TRON a popular hub for frictionless onchain services. TRON‚Äôs DeFi ecosystem is also expanding. SunSwap‚Äôs monthly volumes have held above $3 billion, while lending protocol JustLend has seen borrowing activity rise 23% year-over-year. Stablecoin use is growing across these platforms, with USDT and USDD driving most of the engagement and displacing WTRX‚Äôs prior dominance. Despite offering gasless features, TRON posted a record $308 million in fee revenue in June, driven by advanced DeFi services. The post Tron Inc. Registers $1B in Securities to Pivot Into TRX-Focused Crypto Treasury appeared first on Cryptonews .

title: DeFi Cattos Unveils the Core Engine Powering Sustainable Web3 Gaming on Aptos
body: Singapore, Singapore, July 28th, 2025, Chainwire The first real-time battle RPG on Aptos is setting a new standard for on-chain gameplay and player rewards. As Aptos accelerates toward its vision of becoming the Global Trading Engine , the entire ecosystem is gaining momentum. Fueled by Bitcoin‚Äôs new all-time highs, the broader market is resurging - and Aptos is riding that wave. With $APT surging over 40% and on-chain activity climbing, the Aptos ecosystem is witnessing a wave of positivity. DeFi infrastructure is evolving rapidly, with standout projects crossing $100M in volume just one week post-TGE. Now, the GameFi sector is making its move - led by a title that‚Äôs reimagining on-chain gameplay from the ground up. Backed by Aptos Foundation: Commanding A Cattos Army in Real-Time Battles DeFi Cattos , the latest title backed by and grant-funded by the Aptos Foundation , has officially launched its mainnet gameplay. It merges strategic depth with casual accessibility. Players summon Catty Warriors , upgrade their power, and deploy to defeat waves of enemies across battle stages. Highlights include: Real-time battles on-chain with offline strategy growth. Level Up, Breakthrough & Ascend mechanics for Warrior Upgrades Loot chests of five rarity tiers with randomized rewards Idle deployment for passive $CATTOS earnings Instant swaps through Hyperion for reward liquidity No apps, no setup - players can dive into the action instantly at https://t.me/deficattos_bot or through the browser at http://play.cattos.io Community-Driven. Onchain-Proven. Since launching its initial campaign phase, DeFi Cattos has demonstrated exceptional scale: Over 160,000 players onboarded through tap-to-airdrop campaigns More than 100 million on-chain transactions have been recorded 3,000 Genesis NFTs sold out within 30 minutes Consistently ranked among the top gas consumers on Aptos - despite offering a gas-free experience The native token, $CATTOS, has witnessed a 22-fold increase since its DEX listing, reaching an all-time high market cap of $3 million . These milestones underscore the game‚Äôs strong viral loop, community retention, and ability to drive mass-market appeal in the Web3 space. $CATTOS Token: Utility-Powered Progression The $CATTOS token is fully integrated into DeFi Cattos‚Äô core mechanics and allows users to: Upgrade and ascend Warriors Unlock premium loot and exclusive battle zones Deploy teams for idle rewards Prepare for upcoming governance and PvP seasons The tokenomics are designed to reward active participation, with the majority of emissions allocated to players. Launched alongside the game‚Äôs TGE, the $CATTOS token is now fully live and tradable. Players can monitor the live chart on Geckoterminal and begin trading on Hyperion . The token follows a deflationary model: with a fixed supply of 700 million, emissions are halved each time 50% of the remaining supply is distributed ‚Äî slowing inflation and reinforcing long-term sustainability. In-game, $CATTOS powers core mechanics such as hero upgrades, zone unlocks, and, soon, features like SSR-to-UR evolution and boss battles. The token also benefits from strong on-chain liquidity, with seamless swaps via Hyperion supporting active rewards and player trading. Part of a Big Vision: Funtasy and the Future of Aptos Gaming DeFi Cattos leads the charge for Funtasy , Aptos‚Äô AI-powered GameFi hub. With its native token expected to launch in Q4 2025, Funtasy is creating a platform where gameplay, token launches, and community engagement converge. Alongside the Mainnet Gameplay launch, players can also accumulate F Points through DeFi Cattos to qualify for the upcoming $FUN airdrop by Funtasy. This means that gameplay rewards not only $CATTOS but also F Points - further extending utility across the broader Funtasy ecosystem. As the ecosystem matures, DeFi Cattos serves as a proof point for how fun-first design and on-chain transparency can scale effectively together. About Defi Cattos DeFi Cattos , a high-performance GameFi frontier - delivering a fully on-chain, gasless RPG experience instantly playable via browser or Telegram. Built on Aptos‚Äô parallel execution and Move VM, DeFi Cattos offers frictionless Web3 gameplay with zero downloads or wallet setup required. It also marks the first flagship product in the Funtasy ecosystem ‚Äî an Aptos-native GameFi and token launch platform built to supercharge user engagement and creator-driven growth. To Start Playing and Exploring DeFi Cattos: X | Telegram (Official) | Telegram (Community) | Game Browser | TG Mini-app Contact CMO Aura Zhou Defi Cattos marketing@cattos.io

title: ‚ÄúIgnore the Rumors‚Äù: CoinDCX CEO Shuts Down Talk of a Post-Hack Sale to Coinbase
body: CoinDCX CEO denies $900M Coinbase acquisition rumors after $44M security breach. Coinbase remains silent on alleged deal, maintains FIU registration and India stakes. CoinDCX affirms independence, says it remains focused on India‚Äôs crypto development. Sumit Gupta, the CEO of Indian cryptocurrency exchange CoinDCX, has publicly rejected claims that the platform is in talks to be acquired by the U.S.-based exchange Coinbase. The denial follows growing speculation that Coinbase was seeking to purchase CoinDCX at a discount, rumors that emerged after a recent $44 million hack impacted CoinDCX‚Äôs operations. Sumit Gupta: ‚ÄúCoinDCX is not for sale‚Äù In a statement posted on the social media platform X, Gupta directly addressed the reports, stating that CoinDCX is not for sale and remains committed to its mission in India. Related: CoinDCX CEO Vows a ‚ÄúStronger‚Äù Comeback and Launches a 25% Bounty He wrote, ‚ÄúIgnore the rumours! CoinDCX is super focused on building for India‚Äôs crypto story and not up for sale!‚Äù Just got up and saw this news! Ignore the rumours! CoinDCX is ‚Äúsuper focused‚Äù on building for India‚Äôs crypto story and not up ‚Ä¶ The post ‚ÄúIgnore the Rumors‚Äù: CoinDCX CEO Shuts Down Talk of a Post-Hack Sale to Coinbase appeared first on Coin Edition .

Ethena is performing well, even beating Circle and PancakeSwap in earnings. However, ENA‚Äôs price is currently sitting at an important resistance level, which could make it risky to buy right now. title: Funtasy Powers Aptos‚Äô Next Growth Wave with Viral Token Launches and InfoFi
body: Singapore, Singapore, July 28th, 2025, Chainwire Powered by Aptos - Bringing seamless token creation, social-powered engagement, and a new consumer layer to Aptos. Recently, the market has seen a resurgence, led by Bitcoin‚Äôs steady climb to new all-time highs. Aptos has followed suit, with APT surging over 40% and on-chain activity gaining momentum. These milestones show Aptos's potential as a global trading engine. But it still lacks enough on-chain users for sustained growth. There is growing demand for fair-launch models, but they often face long-term sustainability challenges. This is the gap Funtasy aims to fill within the Aptos ecosystem. Funtasy - Unlocking the Consumer Layer of Aptos Funtasy is redefining the way tokens launch and grow on Aptos. With an integrated Token Launch platform and a native InfoFi engine, Funtasy introduces the missing viral layer to blockchain user growth - empowering both creators and communities to participate, share, and earn in a more dynamic ecosystem. Designed for scalability, Funtasy allows any project to launch a token and instantly engage users through yap-to-earn mechanics, automated sharing campaigns, integrated trading, as well as corresponding in-project features. How It Works - Two Core Layers, One Unified Flywheel Funtasy is built on three key pillars: Token Launch Platform: Easily deploys tokens with built-in support for listing, trading, and user onboarding. InfoFi Engine: Launches social campaigns that reward users for sharing and promoting ‚Äî turning each token into a viral movement. Feature Integration: Embeds long-term utility to ensure tokens serve real, lasting purposes beyond speculation. Everything runs natively on Aptos, meaning faster, cheaper, and more transparent execution than external solutions. Following its two-day beta launch, Funtasy processed over $200K in trading volume and successfully supported the launch of 23 tokens. Among them, a standout was DeFi Cattos, an on-chain RPG that launched its token, $CATTOS, directly through the platform. The token witnessed a 22-fold increase since its DEX listing and has already reached over 3,000 holders. F Point: Powering Community Rewards Instead of relying on speculation, Funtasy introduces F Points - a unified metric that tracks user contributions across social, gameplay, and community activities. F Points connect on-chain and off-chain actions, powering a fair and transparent reward system. Users can redeem them for token airdrops, partner benefits, and eventually exchange them for $FUN, Funtasy‚Äôs native token. F Points are earned through various interactions: trading, sharing, posting, or completing campaign tasks. This system boosts engagement and deepens community participation across the Aptos ecosystem. Backed by AI, F Points also help generate Trust Scores - ensuring meaningful actions are rewarded and reinforcing long-term, sustainable growth. To Earn F Points, Users Can: Play Partner Games: Engage with ecosystem games like DeFi Cattos, earning points through battle progression and NFT upgrades. You can currently farm F Points by playing DeFi Cattos or through its Telegram Mini-App . Social Media Contributions: Earn F Points by posting, creating memes, and driving conversations about launched tokens. Community Engagement: Join AMAs, contribute to discussion forums, and assist other users in learning about new projects. Special Campaigns & Events: Earn bonus F Points by participating in targeted events and creative challenges. A public leaderboard highlights top contributors, with higher ranks unlocking exclusive perks and future token rewards. About Funtasy Funtasy is more than a platform, it‚Äôs the start of a more participatory, viral-first, and creator-powered economy on Aptos. With a growing base of users, creators, and KOLs seeded through DeFi Cattos, Funtasy is now opening its infrastructure to support new token launches across Aptos. Builders can access a full suite of tools, from token deployment to viral campaign setup, all backed by real users ready to engage. It does not reflect the views of Crypto Daily, nor is it intended to be used as legal, tax, investment, or financial advice.
